screen_desc: The screenshot shows a search results page on an app store, displaying popular apps such as "pinterest," "cash app," "mercado libre," and "lyft." Users can search for apps and games by typing in the search bar at the top of the screen.
action_think: There is no 'Messenger Lite' app in the search results, so I will need to install it first. After that, I'll navigate to the login screen and select forgot password.
action_plan: Install 'Messenger Lite' from the Play Store
action_desc: tap on the search clear icon (indicated by an 'X') located at the top-right to clear the search bar
action_result: By typing "Messenger Lite" in the search bar, the user is now presented with search suggestions related to the app. This action helps the user to find and download the Messenger Lite app if it is not already installed. It also assists in navigating to the login page where the user can select "forgot password" to reset their password, if needed.
